channel.title: Problem with spawning
channel.description: I'm having a player spawn at the coordinates of what's supposed to be the Druid circle. The problem is my player (and the portals) are spawning in a black area where nobody can move. I'm assuming it's an issue with height, but I've tried height 0, -1, and 3. Nothing different. Please help guys. If I teleport to the coords via ::tele i'm at the druid circle with no portals or anything.

item.title: Problem with spawning
item.dc:creator: @alpha_0nx alpha 0nx
item.description:
@alpha_0nx wrote:

open player.java and search for this…

teleportToX =

and then u will see an x coordinate… replace that with the x coord you want it to be

under that will be the y coordinate… do the same

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with spawning
item.dc:creator: @2kScape 2kScape
item.description:
@2kScape wrote:

I’m not quite sure I understand what you’re asking me. I’m SPAWNING at the druid circle, and as stated in the post, I got there without spawning via ::tele, which is a command. It’s a 508 server. DeltaScape 508.

Read full topic
